Detailed Description

Manages the list of ImageHistoryItems (to do undo and redo) as well as carry out the undo and redo operations.

Parameters:
ImageRevisions A list of ImageHistoryItem objects (which contain an Image object and a string detailing the operation).

Member Function Documentation

void Core::ImageHistory::AddImageToImageHistory ( PictureBoxImage  image,
string  operation 
) [inline]

Appends the Image object and string passed in to the end of the ImageRevisions list.

Parameters:
image The image to add to the list
operation A string detailing what operation was just performed
int Core::ImageHistory::GetCurrentRevision (  )  [inline]

Returns the value of the iterator (essentially where we are in the ImageRevisions list).

Returns:
CurrentRevision The value of the iterator for the list.
int Core::ImageHistory::GetNumberOfImagesInHistory (  )  [inline]

Returns the number of ImageHistoryItem objects on the ImageRevisions list.

Returns:
ImageRevisions.Count() The current number of items in the list.
string Core::ImageHistory::GetRedoToolTip (  )  [inline]

Returns the tooltip for the next item in the history.

string Core::ImageHistory::GetUndoToolTip (  )  [inline]

Returns the tooltip for the previous item in the history.

string The tooltip for the previous item.
PictureBoxImage Core::ImageHistory::Redo (  )  [inline]

Attempts a redo operation by checking if an object exists after the CurrentRevision iterator, then returning that ImageHistoryItem node if it does exist.

bool Core::ImageHistory::RedoIsPossible (  )  [inline]

Returns whether or not there exists an image to redo in the history.

Returns:
bool Whether or not ImageHistory can perform a redo
PictureBoxImage Core::ImageHistory::Undo (  )  [inline]

Attempts an undo operation by checking if an object exists before the CurrentRevision iterator, then returning that ImageHistoryItem node if it does exist.

bool Core::ImageHistory::UndoIsPossible (  )  [inline]

Returns whether or not there exists an image to undo to in the history.

Returns:
bool Whether or not ImageHistory can perform a undo.
